item.title: Australia's Monochrome Spot Bitcoin ETF's BTC Holdings Rise to 1021 Coins
item.description: On September 1st, according to an official announcement, the Australian Monochrome Physical Bitcoin ETF (IBTC) disclosed that as of August 29th, its holdings had reached 1,021 bitcoins, with a holding value of approximately 172 million Australian dollars.

item.title: Metaplanet's Shareholder Meeting Today to Vote on $8.84 Billion Stock Sale Plan
item.description: On September 1st, according to Techinasia, at 9:00 a.m. on September 1st (assuming this is the specific time in the local context), the publicly listed Japanese company Metaplanet will convene a shareholders' meeting in Tokyo. During this meeting, a vote will be conducted on a plan to sell up to 550 million new shares overseas, with the aim of raising approximately $884 million. The company intends to utilize the majority of the funds to purchase a greater amount of Bitcoin.Eric Trump, the son of former U.S. President Donald Trump and an advisor to Metaplanet since March, is anticipated to attend this event.

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Intensive Rebalancing, Over $66 Million USDC Large Transaction in 24 Hours
item.description: September 1st. This week, there are intensive macro events. The market focuses on the U.S. non-farm payroll and unemployment rate data to be released on Friday, which may significantly affect the Fed's interest rate cut expectations and trigger market volatility. In addition, the highly anticipated project WLFI has officially started today.At this crucial moment, according to HyperInsight monitoring, multiple whale addresses have experienced abnormal large capital flows on Hyperliquid. The total scale exceeds $66 million. It is presumed that they are preparing for potential market changes. Specific anomalies include:Large withdrawals (bearish/profit-taking?):Address 0x5405... withdrew 14,499,994 USDC (approximately $14.5 million);Address 0x416b... withdrew 7,951,493.29 USDC (approximately $7.95 million);Address 0x0656... withdrew 2,198,138.96 USDC (approxim

item.title: On the eve of WLFI's listing, the crypto market experienced a general downturn, with the total market capitalization falling to the $3.8 trillion range.
item.description: On September 1st, based on CoinGecko data, on the eve of WLFI's listing, the crypto market witnessed a general decline. The total crypto market capitalization currently stands at $3.81 trillion, indicating a 1.5% decrease over the past 24 hours.Among the biggest losers on the list, meme coins took the lead. NOBODY saw a daily decline of 18.2%, BLOCK declined by 17.2%, and NEIRO dropped by 17.3%.Regarding mainstream altcoins, SKL recorded a daily decline of 11.9%, and CFX saw a daily drop of 10.6%.

item.title: The high-profile Ethereum to Bitcoin (ETH to BTC) Whale conducted a significant swap, selling a total of 2000 BTC and purchasing 48,942 ETH over a period of nearly 4 hours.
item.description: On September 1st, as monitored by LookOnChain, in the past 4 hours, the highly prominent BTC whale that has been swapping ETH has sold an additional 2,000 BTC (valued at $215 million) and purchased 48,942 ETH (also valued at $215 million).He has now amassed a total of 886,371 ETH (amounting to $4.07 billion).

item.title: Survey: WLFI Small Holders Sell-Off Target Price $0.47, Whale Holders Target Price $1
item.description: September 1st. In a Discord group survey among holders who own at least 1 million WLFI tokens, numerous small holders indicated that they would choose to sell if the price reaches $0.47. The group operator, Vincent Deriu, revealed that large holders are aiming for a price above $1. Many are planning to sell only a portion of their tokens, up to 20%. Holder Bruno Ver stated that he intends to sell approximately 10% of his holdings after trading begins. He predicted that the token's price could reach $0.35 to $0.5. "It will definitely be used for family expenses," he disclosed. "I've already informed my wife that we are going on a cruise in September." (Jinse)

item.title: Gate will list World Liberty Financial (WLFI) spot trading at 20:00 on September 1st.
item.description: September 1st. According to an official announcement, at the request of the World Liberty Financial (WLFI) project team, Gate will list World Liberty Financial (WLFI) spot trading at 20:00 on September 1st (coordinated universal time + 8).

item.title: 0xSun: If Ethereum cannot sustain its lead in the market, we may consider ending the "long ETH, short various altcoins" strategy
item.description: On September 1st, Smart Money, the crypto KOL 0xsun.sol (@0xSunNFT) summarized the "Long ETH, Short Shitcoins" strategy on social media. They said, "In general, this strategy has been very successful, especially when facing market volatility. In the last few days of August, due to SOL's sudden strength, which led the altcoins, the profits of the strategy suffered some drawdowns. We will continue to observe. If this situation persists for a while and ETH cannot lead the market, we can consider taking profits."Furthermore, regarding on-chain operations, 0xSun mentioned, "Currently, because the listing channel cannot be opened, there is a limited ceiling. It is still a good choice for small funds, but the cost-effectiveness for large funds is too low. Liquidity injection is needed, or some iconic events to open up the ceiling to improve this situation."

item.title: Data: The WLFI total on-chain staking amount has reached $880 million, with a 47.58% increase in the last 24 hours.
item.description: On September 1st, based on Coinglass data, the current total on-chain contract position of WLFI is $880 million. In terms of coins, the position is 2.563 billion WLFI, and it has increased by 47.58% in the past 24 hours.

item.title: Bithumb will list the USD/KRW trading pair
item.description: On September 1st, as per official information, Bithumb is set to list the USD1/KRW trading pair. The trading is scheduled to commence on Monday, September 1, 2025, at 4:00 PM in the local time.Previously, there were reports suggesting that Upbit announced it would list WLFI along with USD1/KRW, USDT, and Bitcoin trading pairs.
